General.Name: Jiangsu Luokai Mechanical & Electrical Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Jiangsu Luokai Mechanical &Electrical Co., Ltd . researches, develops, produces, sells, and services various high and low voltage electrical distribution equipment in the people's Republic of China and internationally. Its products are used in the power distribution facilities of the power system, including low-voltage and medium-high voltage circuit breakers supporting frame racks, operating mechanisms, accessories and intelligent ring network cabinets, circuit breaker unit operating mechanisms, switches of intelligent ring network cabinets, load switch unit operating mechanism and switches, combined electrical unit operating mechanism and switches, etc. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Changzhou, the people's Republic of China.
